body:
- Fixed many various editor and in-game crashes
- Fixed Desolate Rift not having any enemy spawn points
- Fixed non-rotateable blocks having a rotation arrow when placing [Mobile]
- Fixed rotation arrow not matching line orientation [Mobile]
- Fixed ores on sand not being mine-able
- Fixed conveyors not displaying correct item speed
- Moved launch button to top right corner of screen
- Added new icon
- Added executable icon [Windows]
- Added tainted water block
- Added setting for disabling shadows
- Added "launched items" text to item display for less confusion
- Possible fix for incorrect "openGL 2.0 missing" errors [Windows]
- Possible crash fix for devices that support only 1024x1024 textures
- More attempts to fix menu bug (why)

iOS build is coming soon.
name: v4 Build 67 - Beta
